subject: Track and Field
organizations: International Association of Athletics Federation World Athlete
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan 800-meter runner David Rudisha and the Croatian high jumper Blanka Vlasic have won the International Association of Athletics Federation World Athlete of the Year awards.
snippet: The Kenyan 800-meter runner David Rudisha and the Croatian high jumper Blanka Vlasic have won the International Association of Athletics Federation World Athlete of the Year awards.
